title: Games after class
text: Two college friends liked to go play volleyball after class.
The problem is that the volleyball cour was close to the soccer court.
So they created a rule that whoever arrived first could play until the end, and only then could the others play, to avoid confusion.

title: The dream
text: Jenny's living room was a mess. She was exhausted which made it difficult for her to clean up the living room. Suddenly, she fell asleep on the sofa.
While Jenny was asleep, she dreamt her living room was already arranged by her and she was happy about it.
However, when Jenny woke up she discovered her living room was as messy just the way it was before she slept off. She was quite disappointed.

title: Environment makes a difference
text: One day Lizzie walked into her living room and notice just how drab and dreery everything looked. She decided she needed to do something as she was having a little get together this coming weekend. inspired she set off to the store.

Lizzie finished decorating and couldn't believe the transformation. She even felt more positive and better about herself. She thought how amazing it was that your enviroment can change how you feel about yourself. "I'm ready for my party," said Lizzi
Lizzie's party was a success. The women all loved her house, but most of all Lizzie loved her house and felt wonderful!

title: Mike Cheering Alice up
text: It had been raining all week, and Mike's girlfriend was getting pretty depressed, so he decided he would get a bunch of their beach stuff together put it up inside, and get her flowers to cheer her up.
When Alice finally returned home, she was surprised and happy to see Mike sitting there with a bottle of wine and some flowers.
She sat down next to him, and had a nice glass of wine and really cheered her up.

title: Improving.
text: I was floating over a tree when I saw my attacker lightly posing above a tree, much like the wuxia films.
He said: You have made progress.
Without further ado, I sent a barrage of attacks, this time with so much force that even startled my attacker.

title: A lifeless planet
text: Steve was an intergalatic traveler who traveled at the speed of light. As the theory of relativity proved time passes more slowly in the ship than for the rest under normal conditions. Fell on a lifeless planet, but with oxygen.
Walkin on a beach for days, Steve noticed the similarities with the Earth,but it couln't be your home planet, he was trillions of kilometers away and there would be people, cities and animal.
It was then that he felt something in the sand. He pulled and it was a doll. Steve understood the, he was on Earth. "What did you do!!!??? shouted Steve.

title: Cartwheel Master
text: Carol was jealous watching Lizzy and Bobby do cartwheels with ease at the park. To make matters worse, Lizzy and Bobby wouldn't share the trick of how to do cartwheels with Carol.
Carol went home and found a video explaining the steps to do a perfect cartwheel. Carol watched the video over and over, even taking notes.
The next time Carol saw Lizzy and Bobby at the park, she performed a perfect cartwheel in front of them, even better than theirs.

title: Motivation for Maths
text: Jane was a maths teacher in a nearby school. She teaches maths very well. However, her students are not interested in maths. This worried Jane a lot
Jane worried much about her students. She is unable to sleep properly because of this problem. Suddenly she saw her sleeping cat jumping fastly to catch the rat. She got an idea

She announced the competition that those who are going to get good marks in maths in the upcoming test are going to receive special gifts. Students are motivated by her words and got good marks in maths and received gifts. Jane was very happy.

title: Sofia and the yarn ball
text: Harry was sitting on the couch one day when his cat Sofia was looking rather bored.
Harry then got up and grabbed a ball of yarn for Sophia to play with.
Sofia was thrilled to receive the yarn ball and played with it for a half hour.

title: Jared broke the window
text: Jared was playing football by himself inside his house.He was having a great time.
He wasn't concentrating on where he was kicking the ball.Jared managed to kick the ball at the window.
Jared was so scared becuase he knows that his dad will kill him becuase a new window will be expensive.
